title: Green&Berry
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, American, Juice bar, Delivery, Take-out, Bakery, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Serves mostly vegan food; the only exception is fish. Serves sandwiches (including a vegan tofu avocado sandwich with vegetarian options), salads and bowls (such as quinoa/avo/veggies, kale salad, zucchini pasta, acai bowls), breakfast foods (such as chai puddings or yogurt with granola), a wide selection of smoothies and juices, and vegan sweets and pastries. The vegan desserts include different types of balls, cookies, donuts, brownies, and cakes.
